In environment X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X IHn : ∑ (S n) f = ∑ n f ⊕ f n Unable to unify "∑ n f ⊕ f n ⊕ f (S n)" with "f 0 ⊕ ∑ (S n) (fun n : nat => f (S n))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
m: X -> X -> X
u: X
Hmonoid: monoid_theory m u
n: nat
f: nat -> X

Goal:
∑ (S n) f = ∑ n f ⊕ f n

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
monoid_theory : forall X : Type, (X -> X -> X) -> X -> Prop
msum_S : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (S n) f = f 0 ⊕ ∑ n (fun n0 : nat => f (S n0))
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
VectorEq.cast : VectorDef.t ?A ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> VectorDef.t ?A n0 where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
msum_plus : forall (a b : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ (a + b) f = ∑ a f ⊕ ∑ b (fun i : nat => f (a + i))
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n) -> Fin.t (p + ?m) -> Fin.t (p + ?n) where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat] ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
Fin.cast : Fin.t ?m -> forall n0 : nat, ?m = n0 -> Fin.t n0 where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, Fin.FS x = Fin.FS y -> x = y where ?n : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
msum = fix msum (n : nat) (f : nat -> X) {struct n} : X := match n with | 0 => u | S n0 => f 0 ⊕ msum n0 (fun n1 : nat => f (S n1)) end : nat -> (nat -> X) -> X Arguments msum _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- nat]
msum_1 : forall f : nat -> X, ∑ 1 f = f 0
msum_0 : forall f : nat -> X, ∑ 0 f = u
msum_fold_map : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> X), ∑ n f = fold_right m u (map f (list_an 0 n))
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X |- Type]
monoid_unit_l : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m u x = x
monoid_unit_r : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x : X, m x u = x
monoid_assoc : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), monoid_theory m u -> forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z
mk_monoid : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X), (forall x : X, m u x = x) -> (forall x : X, m x u = x) -> (forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z) -> monoid_theory m u
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker_sound : forall (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z)) (w : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof), ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker f w = true -> forall env : RingMicromega.PolEnv Z, Tauto.eval_bf (ZMicromega.Zeval_formula env) f
measure_rect2 : forall (X Y : Type) (m : X -> Y -> nat) (P : X -> Y -> Type), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), (forall (x' : X) (y' : Y), m x' y' < m x y -> P x' y') -> P x y) -> forall (x : X) (y : Y), P x y
map_map : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B) (g : B -> C) (l : list A), map g (map f l) = map (fun x : A => g (f x)) l
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Fin.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p -> P (S n) (Fin.FS p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : Fin.t (S n)), P n p
ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker = fun (f : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z)) (w : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof) => Tauto.tauto_checker ZMicromega.Zunsat ZMicromega.Zdeduce ZMicromega.normalise ZMicromega.negate (fun cl : list (RingMicromega.NFormula Z * unit) => ZMicromega.ZChecker (map fst cl)) f w : Tauto.BFormula (RingMicromega.Formula Z) -> list ZMicromega.ZArithProof -> bool Arguments ZMicromega.ZTautoChecker _ _%list_scope
ZifyClasses.mkrel : forall (S T : Type) (R : S -> S -> Prop) (I : S -> T) (TR : T -> T -> Prop), (forall n m : S, R n m <-> TR (I n) (I m)) -> forall (s1 : S) (t1 : T), I s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S) (t2 : T), I s2 = t2 -> R s1 s2 < -> TR t1 t2
Fin.t_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
Nat.lt_alt = fun n m : nat => exists p : nat, S p + n = m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.lt_alt (_ _)%nat_scope
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
Nat.sub_succ_l : forall n m : nat, n <= m -> S m - n = S (m - n)
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
gcd.divides = fun n k : nat => exists p : nat, k = p * n : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments gcd.divides (_ _)%nat_scope
list_an = fix list_an (a n : nat) {struct n} : list nat := match n with | 0 => nil | S n0 => a :: list_an (S a) n0 end : nat -> nat -> list nat Arguments list_an (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
ZifyClasses.mkapp : forall (S1 S2 T : Type) (OP : S1 -> S2) (I1 : S1 -> T) (I2 : S2 -> T) (TUOP : T -> T), (forall n : S1, I2 (OP n) = TUOP (I1 n)) -> forall (s1 : S1) (t1 : T), I1 s1 = t1 -> I2 (OP s1) = TUOP t1
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.N {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.I {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope
ZifyClasses.mkapp2 : forall (S1 S2 S3 T : Type) (Op : S1 -> S2 -> S3) (I1 : S1 -> T) (I2 : S2 -> T) (I3 : S3 -> T) (TBOP : T -> T -> T), (forall (n : S1) (m : S2), I3 (Op n m) = TBOP (I1 n) (I2 m)) -> forall (s1 : S1) (t1 : T), I1 s1 = t1 -> forall (s2 : S2) (t2 : T), I2 s2 = t2 -> I3 (Op s1 s2) = TBOP t1 t2
VectorDef.shiftin = fix shiftin (A : Type) (n : nat) (a : A) (v : VectorDef.t A n) {struct v} : VectorDef.t A (S n) := match v in (VectorDef.t _ n0) return (VectorDef.t A (S n0)) with | VectorDef.nil _ => VectorDef.cons A a 0 (VectorDef.nil A) | VectorDef.cons _ h n0 t => VectorDef.cons A h (S n0) (shiftin A n0 a t) end : forall (A : Type) (n : nat), A -> VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.shiftin {A}%type_scope {n}%nat_scope
beq_nat_eq : forall n m : nat, true = (n =? m) -> n = m
